Code

We try to publish all of our code promptly when publishing new research. If you don’t find the code you’re looking for here, contact the corresponding authors.

  • uwsampa on GitHub
  • grappa.io – Grappa: scaling irregular applications on commodity clusters
  • approxbench.org – benchmarks for approximate computing
  • SQL for PGAS – compiling queries to high performance languages, including Grappa

See the licensing terms within each project’s codebase for the requisite legal details.
